lead_paragraph: Trump Entertainment Resorts says a new $20 million pledge by billionaire investor Carl Icahn will give it time to restructure while keeping the struggling Taj Mahal casino open.

headline.main: Trump Entertainment Eyes New Financing From Icahn
headline.print_headline: Trump Entertainment Eyes New Financing From Icahn

snippet: Trump Entertainment Resorts says a new $20 million pledge by billionaire investor Carl Icahn will give it time to restructure while keeping the struggling Taj Mahal casino open....
